channel.title: Raspberry Pi on Matthew Haffner
channel.description: Recent content in Raspberry Pi on Matthew Haffner

item.title: Pi-hole troubleshooting: An overview of my recent installation
item.description: Introduction My first Pi-hole installation was a pain mostly due to self-inflicted issues. That said there are a few disjointed steps, and my lack of networking knowledge will necessitate a future reference to more a in-depth guide than what’s currently available. This post serves as self-documentation on what went wrong so that I (or others) can avoid problems in future installations. Network issues After initial installation, I could not access the Pi-hole admin page nor the internet.
